main.name: Paul Wilson
main.bio: I am a systems engineer with over 10 years experience working in both private and public cloud.  I have a passion for building and working on the full stack of websites and applications.  Check out some of my skills and creations below.

resume.skillmessage: These are the technical skills I am good at.  I am proficient in some while others I'm still learning.  I'd love to learn more.

projects.title: Couch Buddy
projects.description: This is built with NextJS and hosted in Vercel. There is also a backend Python component that refreshes the data daily, with data in AWS S3 and Cloudfront.

projects.title: Couch Buddy Blog
projects.description: I used Contentful and integrated with their API for a CMS on blog of CouchBuddy.  I created multiple templates for differnet blog posts, some of them are interactive .

projects.title: Covid19 NSW
projects.description: I made this when the recent pandemic started. It is a Python Flask site running in an EC2 instance. Some pages include React for interactivity.

projects.title: The General Quiz
projects.description: This is hosted in AWS Amplify, utilising AppSync with GraphQL and DynamoDB. The website is created with React Native with the plan to make it into a mobile App. I also have an admin website that uses React with Cognito for authentication.

projects.title: SnackBar Parking
projects.description: I made this with Django and it is hosted at Heroku. It had a short creative life but it was helpful in learning Django.
